name: Naturally Stealthy
description: Sneaking while up against an entity larger than you will render you (but not your armor) invisible.

entity_action.command: /execute if entity @e[distance=..1,type=#digs_dnd_origins:halfling_nimbleness_entities,tag=!small,nbt=!{IsBaby:1b}] run effect give @s minecraft:invisibility 1 0 true
